more.openMoreOptions:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for the 'More options' button icon
**UI Location**: Editor header → More options button
**When Users See This**: When the 'More options' button icon is displayed
**Technical Context**: Used as the `alt` attribute for the icon. No special formatting.
**Current English**: "Open more options"
more.revertToExerciseStart:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to reset the code to the initial state of the exercise
**UI Location**: Editor header → More options dropdown menu
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'More options' dropdown
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button. No special formatting.
**Current English**: "Revert to exercise start"
more.revertToLastIteration:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to revert the code to the state of the last saved iteration
**UI Location**: Editor header → More options dropdown menu
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'More options' dropdown
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button. No special formatting.
**Current English**: "Revert to last iteration"
more.reportABug:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to open a bug reporting modal
**UI Location**: Editor header → More options dropdown menu
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'More options' dropdown
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button. No special formatting.
**Current English**: "Report a bug"
